blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: The proposal
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MkEDup

by wakeupwildfire26

Jeon Jungkook is at the peak of his success only to fall into deep trouble that can make him lose not only his job but also threatens to throw him out of the country that is keeping him and his friend Kim Taehyung safe.

His only way out of the trouble is his assistant Park Jimin. The question is will Park Jimin be his salvation or the reason for his downfall.

This summary is so shitty but I hope that it doesn’t scare you away.

  • Relationships: Jeon Jungkook/Park Jimin, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Kim Taehyung | V, Kim Namjoon | RM/Kim Seokjin | Jin, Min Yoongi | Suga/Park Jimin

blog.name: agust-meow
blog.title: Basic Bangtan Bitches
blog.description: Masterlist Reactions, scenarios, texts, snaps and more. Requests are OPEN

title: Morning with them
body:
●Jin~

It was a quiet chilly morning of october and you were sleeping with your boyfriend. Last night he came so late to bed because he was busy besides the fact that you gone to bed earlier than usual. Your week was not the best one so far and that made you sleep through the whole morning.

He thought that maybe he could your hard work with something special. Although he got only 4 hours of sleep, his girl deserved a special breakfast, so he left the bed, moving slowly to not wake you up.

After almost 45 minutes, everything was ready. He made you some bread slices with yogurt, fruits and cereal and omelet with ham pieces. Jin came slowly to your room,  carrying the tray carefully. He put in on the bed, kissing your forehead, waiting for you to wake up.

●Yoongi~

Yoongi absolutely loves to wake up near you in the morning. Today was your one year anniversary and you still haven’t wake up. He looked at your sleeping figure while kissing your cheeks and forehead with his peachy lips. Maybe he wanted lazy morning sex but you were sleeping like an angel and that made him a ball of fluff. He then started to whisper sweet nothings in your ear. You rarely hear him saying those kind of stuff, he usually is locked up in himself.

You were awake for like 10 minutes but didn’t want to wake up for nothing in the world. To hear your boyfriend talking like that about you and your realtionship, you clearly wanted to hear more. Those moments are rare but oh so priceless.

●Namjoon~

You woke up earlier than you wanted and your boyfriend was still sleeping. Like, of course he was still sleeping, he had practice until very late last night and was tired as hell. You were in front of the kitchen’s window with a hot cup of coffee in your little hands then you suddenly feel a pair of big arms around you and you know its him.

“Come back to bed, baby!”

Of course you can’t refuse him so you decide to drink your coffee in bed. In the moment you were lying again with him on the matress, Namjoon put his head on your chest. You started to play with his hair and he fell asleep immediately.

●Hoseok~

You woke up with an arm around your waist. You loved the sensation, you loved everytime his skin met yours. You reached for your phone to take a selfie with him still sleeping. Hobi looked so peaceful that you showered his entire face with kisses. You then took your polaroid camera from the nightstand to take another photo with your hand intertwined with his then you turned to face him.

You saw that he’s still not awake yet so you decided to photograph his sleeping face, your hand on his collarbones, brushing the skin lightly. When he finally woke up, the most beautiful was on your face, at the sight of him. He didn’t realise you were taking photos of him but you decided to show them to him later to tell him how cute he is.

●Jimin~

Today was your birthday but you stayed until very late last night because you had a school project for the weekend and you wanted to get it done. It was already 11 am and you had a breakfast date with Jimbles but you didn’t answer your phone.He wasn’t that worried, he thought of this.

He grabbed his wallet and his spare keys to your house. When he got there and saw you sleeping, he smiled to himself and got closer to you. His breath on your face, his lips barely touching yours but you woke up and saw him smiling with a rose in his hand. He wasn’t upset you overslept and told you that it can be a lunch date.

●Taehyung~

Another morning with him. Another morning you slept too much because you stayed up until late to watch your faourite show. Another morning he gets to see you. Usually you woke up before him and made your coffee or breakfast. You would wait in the kitchen with the food ready and a warm smile on your face to repay him for his hard work.

Today is not like that. Tae woke up before you and started to admire your features. Your nose he always boop when he tries to cheer you up, your pinkinsh lips. Then he started to notice how the sun’s light reflects the flower models of the courtains on your skin, making it look like art. You always looked like art for him. He then put his arm around you, smiling softly, waiting for you to wake up.

●Jungkook~

Monday morning. You had school today but unfortunately you two got to bed very late because you wanted to play video games. You were so tired that you forgot to set your alarm. Lucky you, Koookie woke up just in time, in like 15 minutes you should’ve been awake.

Seeing that you are still sleeping, he went to the kitchen where he knew he had a feather and began to tickle you with it. You started to scrunch your nose, something so cute that he began to chuckle, thing that woke you up, totally confused and unaware the fact that you had school. He kissed your cheek and told you that you better get ready.

♡Masterlist

Monday morning. You had school today but unfortunately you two got to bed very late because you wanted to play video games. You were so tired that you forgot to set your alarm. Lucky you, Koookie woke up just in time, in like 15 minutes you should’ve been awake.

Seeing that you are still sleeping, he went to the kitchen where he knew he had a feather and began to tickle you with it. You started to scrunch your nose, something so cute that he began to chuckle, thing that woke you up, totally confused and unaware the fact that you had school. He kissed your cheek and told you that you better get ready.

♡Masterlist
trail.content:
●Jin~

It was a quiet chilly morning of october and you were sleeping with your boyfriend. Last night he came so late to bed because he was busy besides the fact that you gone to bed earlier than usual. Your week was not the best one so far and that made you sleep through the whole morning.

He thought that maybe he could your hard work with something special. Although he got only 4 hours of sleep, his girl deserved a special breakfast, so he left the bed, moving slowly to not wake you up.

After almost 45 minutes, everything was ready. He made you some bread slices with yogurt, fruits and cereal and omelet with ham pieces. Jin came slowly to your room,  carrying the tray carefully. He put in on the bed, kissing your forehead, waiting for you to wake up.

●Yoongi~

Yoongi absolutely loves to wake up near you in the morning. Today was your one year anniversary and you still haven’t wake up. He looked at your sleeping figure while kissing your cheeks and forehead with his peachy lips. Maybe he wanted lazy morning sex but you were sleeping like an angel and that made him a ball of fluff. He then started to whisper sweet nothings in your ear. You rarely hear him saying those kind of stuff, he usually is locked up in himself.

You were awake for like 10 minutes but didn’t want to wake up for nothing in the world. To hear your boyfriend talking like that about you and your realtionship, you clearly wanted to hear more. Those moments are rare but oh so priceless.

●Namjoon~

You woke up earlier than you wanted and your boyfriend was still sleeping. Like, of course he was still sleeping, he had practice until very late last night and was tired as hell. You were in front of the kitchen’s window with a hot cup of coffee in your little hands then you suddenly feel a pair of big arms around you and you know its him.

“Come back to bed, baby!”

Of course you can’t refuse him so you decide to drink your coffee in bed. In the moment you were lying again with him on the matress, Namjoon put his head on your chest. You started to play with his hair and he fell asleep immediately.

●Hoseok~

You woke up with an arm around your waist. You loved the sensation, you loved everytime his skin met yours. You reached for your phone to take a selfie with him still sleeping. Hobi looked so peaceful that you showered his entire face with kisses. You then took your polaroid camera from the nightstand to take another photo with your hand intertwined with his then you turned to face him.

You saw that he’s still not awake yet so you decided to photograph his sleeping face, your hand on his collarbones, brushing the skin lightly. When he finally woke up, the most beautiful was on your face, at the sight of him. He didn’t realise you were taking photos of him but you decided to show them to him later to tell him how cute he is.

●Jimin~

Today was your birthday but you stayed until very late last night because you had a school project for the weekend and you wanted to get it done. It was already 11 am and you had a breakfast date with Jimbles but you didn’t answer your phone.He wasn’t that worried, he thought of this.

He grabbed his wallet and his spare keys to your house. When he got there and saw you sleeping, he smiled to himself and got closer to you. His breath on your face, his lips barely touching yours but you woke up and saw him smiling with a rose in his hand. He wasn’t upset you overslept and told you that it can be a lunch date.

●Taehyung~

Another morning with him. Another morning you slept too much because you stayed up until late to watch your faourite show. Another morning he gets to see you. Usually you woke up before him and made your coffee or breakfast. You would wait in the kitchen with the food ready and a warm smile on your face to repay him for his hard work.

Today is not like that. Tae woke up before you and started to admire your features. Your nose he always boop when he tries to cheer you up, your pinkinsh lips. Then he started to notice how the sun’s light reflects the flower models of the courtains on your skin, making it look like art. You always looked like art for him. He then put his arm around you, smiling softly, waiting for you to wake up.

●Jungkook~

Monday morning. You had school today but unfortunately you two got to bed very late because you wanted to play video games. You were so tired that you forgot to set your alarm. Lucky you, Koookie woke up just in time, in like 15 minutes you should’ve been awake.

Seeing that you are still sleeping, he went to the kitchen where he knew he had a feather and began to tickle you with it. You started to scrunch your nose, something so cute that he began to chuckle, thing that woke you up, totally confused and unaware the fact that you had school. He kissed your cheek and told you that you better get ready.

♡Masterlist
